creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: yellow, blue and white; abstracted image of figures at center and foliage in ULC
markings: LRC of image, on verso, stamped in purple: COLLECTION/ A CLOT/ ATELIER
provenance: Auguste Clot Estate, Paris; Samuel Josefowitz, Lausanne and Whitchurch-on-Thames; (R. M. Light & Company, Inc., Santa Barbara, Calif.); sold to MIA, 2007.
title: Women in the Countryside
